<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Undetectable Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=348)
<actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 379 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** 1 minute ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature or object
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the next time you make your daily preparations
</row>

</column>

---

You shroud a creature or object in wards that hide its alignment. The target appears to be neutral to all effects that would detect its alignment.
